title.narrative: BR Sao Paulo Water Recovery Project - REAGUA

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to increase clean water availability in the critical watersheds in the State of Sao Paulo.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section A, Paragraph 2 | Description :The Borrower shall, no later than four months after theEffective Date or before submitting the first application for withdrawal for Subprojects, whichever shall occur first, employ averification age | Due Date :31-May-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section B, Paragraph 1 | Description :The Borrower shall enter into a Project and PerformanceAgreement (PPA) with each of the Service Providers, and the respective Munic ipality when applicable. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section B, Paragraph 2 | Description :Borrower shall cause the Service Providers implementingTreated Wastewater Reuse Subprojects to enter into an agreement with prospec tive users of treated water to set forth terms andquantity of use. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section E, Paragraph 1 | Description :Borrower shall ensure that no Subproject requiringresettlement is authorized for implementation under the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section F, Paragraph 1 | Description :Borrower shall, through SSE, monitor the implementation ofthe Subprojects, the delivery of the Outputs and compliance with the PPAP erformance Indicators, on a periodic basis. | Frequency:Yearly
